Title: A Difficult Legacy
Description:
Let us talk to Veritistrasz about this vase, $p. 

I want to temper your expectations though. It is just a vase, but you never know. It could be exciting.

Maybe it could point us to a cache of weapons?
ObjectivesText: Talk to Voraxian and Veritistrasz at Rusza'thar Reach.

Objectives.Text: Find out what the Vase is
